document.bingtitle: Ala man marks 55 years of burgers at McDonald's | GadsdenTimes.com
document.description: ... talked about what led him to switch from public relations into the fast-food restaurant ... Whenever we cook meat if it hasn't been sold within 20 minutes, we throw it ...
